summary:
Graduate and EIT certified Civil Engineer, in which I have been working for more than seven years as a civil engineer in different fields of my profession. This allowed me to gain strong background in engineering disciplines especially as site Engineer, office Engineer, Project Manager and Technical Manager.
During this time, I acquired invaluable experience in scheduling, design implementation, controlling, supervision, managing, budgeting, redesign and analysis of various civil projects. Above all however, I gained the discipline of working in a team environment and enthusiasm to make a difference in a career.
